data.lyric:
[ti:Cuban Links]
[ar:Rod Wave/Kevin Gates]
[al:Cuban Links (feat. Kevin Gates)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Cuban Links - Rod Wave/Kevin Gates
[00:00.29]Ayy ayy ayy ayy ayy that's probably Tago
[00:03.03]Pipe that s**t up TnT
[00:08.45]Tre made this beat
[00:21.17]Let's talk 'bout hard times real bottom boy survivor
[00:24.13]Way before the jewelry the groupie hoes and designer
[00:26.86]Back when I was tryna find a way for all my partners
[00:29.57]Rema hit the window popped the door for me and Lijah
[00:32.22]'Member wakin' up with no destination
[00:34.87]But I had some dedication couldn't use my education
[00:37.61]'Cause no nine dollars could help me face what I was facing
[00:40.36]My light bill due envelope blue that mean you
[00:42.78]Behind on payments
[00:43.58]Rap slowed down and I was low on cash
[00:45.50]Fresh out of high school kicked out the house
[00:47.29]For living fast
[00:48.23]Went and got a spot then got a job
[00:49.68]'Cause pops was on my a*s
[00:51.06]Then that's when pops had went to jail so it didn't last
[00:53.71]Hit the block with Brock 'cause I was tryna pay my bills
[00:56.39]Like f**k a rap career let's touch
[00:57.84]These streets and make a mil'
[00:59.26]Fast forward like Rod Wave tell me how you feel
[01:01.81]When I think about my past that s**t give me chills uh
[01:05.13]Wake up in the morning hit my knees and I pray
[01:08.68]Because he finally made a way
[01:10.87]I been runnin' up that paper mama
[01:13.24]And before I let 'em come and take it mama
[01:16.61]I'ma die in these Cuban links
[01:18.24]Start before tell me
[01:20.09]No need why call me
[01:21.81]I'm gon' die in these Cuban links bangers again
[01:24.66]Ayy ay ay
[01:27.97]Die in these Cuban links right now today let's go
[01:33.03]Die in these Cuban links yes Lord
[01:37.44]All my life it been a struggle
[01:39.02]You on and fall off you find out who really love you
[01:41.88]Playin' in the storm drain came out the gutter
[01:44.62]Good relationships I admit I had a couple
[01:47.27]Making love to the money me and bae lil' couple
[01:49.78]Yola cooked down to the oil in it don't switch around
[01:52.01]I need everything when it lock in the pot yeah
[01:54.94]Grab it off the top let it dry work the clock yeah
[01:57.63]Finally up in rank movin' blocks holdin' sham yeah
[02:00.31]Havin' my lil' way ghetto p***y used to act funny
[02:03.10]Now I'm hittin' her hard from the back
[02:04.53]She throw it back for me
[02:05.79]And when I went to jail shawty left
[02:07.32]Turned her back on me
[02:08.51]Flexin' on they a*s pants sag with them racks on 'em
[02:10.65]Wake up in the morning hit my knees and I pray
[02:14.05]Because he finally made a way
[02:16.34]I been runnin' up that paper mama
[02:18.66]And before I let 'em come and take it mama
[02:22.06]I'ma die in these Cuban links
[02:27.08]I'm gon' die in these Cuban links
[02:30.11]Ayy ay ay ayay
[02:33.04]Die in these Cuban links
[02:35.72]Die in these Cuban ay ok
[02:38.59]Die in these Cuban links
[02:41.53]Die in these Cuban links
data.trans:
[ti:Cuban Links]
[ar:Rod Wave/Kevin Gates]
[al:Cuban Links (feat. Kevin Gates)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.29]Yung Tago制作
[00:03.03]TnTXD制作
[00:08.45]Tre Gilliamt制作
[00:21.17]咱们聊聊艰难日子 真正的底层社会幸存者
[00:24.13]很久很久以前 我还没有这些金银珠宝 成群美女 名牌服装
[00:26.86]那时候我想为我的伙伴们找寻一条出路
[00:29.57]Rema推开窗 开门接纳我和Lijah
[00:32.22]记得当初每天醒来都一片茫然
[00:34.87]但我也努力奉献过 我受过的教育没有用
[00:37.61]因为一点点钱不能帮我解决眼前的问题
[00:40.36]我的账单到期了 蓝色的信封寄到家
[00:42.78]那意味着你支付逾期了
[00:43.58]说唱事业受阻 我没什么钱
[00:45.50]刚从高中走入社会 就被赶出家门
[00:47.29]因为我的生活太奢靡
[00:48.23]然后我去找了个地方打工
[00:49.68]因为老爹一直盯着我
[00:51.06]后来没多久 老爹就被抓了 所以这件事儿也没持续多久
[00:53.71]和Brock开始混街头 因为我得付账单
[00:56.39]去他的说唱事业 还不如混街头
[00:57.84]挣他个一百万
[00:59.26]快速发展 Rod Wave 告诉我 你感觉怎么样
[01:01.81]当我想起我的过去 依然觉得心有余悸
[01:05.13]早上醒过来 我双膝跪地 向天祈祷
[01:08.68]因为主终于为我开辟了一条路
[01:10.87]我挣到了很多钞票 妈妈
[01:13.24]在别人来将其夺走之前 妈妈
[01:16.61]我死都要戴着古巴链
[01:18.24]先发制人 告诉我
[01:20.09]没必要 为什么联系我
[01:21.81]我就算死也要戴着古巴链 再次辉煌
[01:24.66]//
[01:27.97]死都戴着古巴链 就是现在 行动起来
[01:33.03]死都戴着古巴链 是的 上帝
[01:37.44]我这一生都在挣扎中度过
[01:39.02]只有经历起起落落 你才会知道真正爱你的人是谁
[01:41.88]从小就过得很艰苦 终于从贫民窟里闯出来
[01:44.62]我承认 我也谈过几次甜蜜的恋爱
[01:47.27]和钞票卿卿我我 我和钞票就是一对小情侣
[01:49.78]钞票从一而终 绝不会背叛我
[01:52.01]日子过得不如意的时候 我只想得到所有
[01:54.94]紧紧把握机会 绝不松懈 昼夜不停地工作
[01:57.63]终于闯出了成绩 在街头风生水起
[02:00.31]我走自己的路 姑娘曾经总是瞧不起我
[02:03.10]现在我让她欲罢不能
[02:04.53]她对我唯命是从
[02:05.79]当我被抓了之后 她就离我而去
[02:07.32]狠心抛下我
[02:08.51]对着他们疯狂炫耀 裤子下垂都是因为里面装了太多钞票
[02:10.65]早上醒过来 我双膝跪地 向天祈祷
[02:14.05]因为主终于为我开辟了一条路
[02:16.34]我挣到了很多钞票 妈妈
[02:18.66]在别人来将其夺走之前 妈妈
[02:22.06]我死都要戴着古巴链
[02:27.08]我就算死也要戴着古巴链
[02:30.11]//
[02:33.04]死都戴着古巴链
[02:35.72]死都戴着古巴链
[02:38.59]死都戴着古巴链
[02:41.53]死都戴着古巴链
